Text: ICAP Load ForecastAttached is the ICAP Load Forecast for those of you who havent seen it It is also posted on the NYISO website at marketsicapinfohtmlsum See attached file NYCA ICAP Load Forecastxls John Pade Manager of Load Forecasting New York Independent System Operator Washington Avenue Extension Albany NY Phone Fax NYCA ICAP Load Forecastxls You are currently subscribed to nyisotie as To unsubscribe send a blank email to

TD ICAP RequirementsAttached is a file containing the TD ICAP requirements TD requirements include the host TO and relevant LSEs and municipalities as appropriate Preliminary LSE ICAP requirements for the capability period beginning May will be issued on March with final requirements coming out on April See attached file ICAP Requirementsxls John Pade Manager of Load Forecasting New York Independent System Operator Washington Avenue Extension Albany NY Phone Fax ICAP Requirementsxls You are currently subscribed to nyisotie as To unsubscribe send a blank email to
